org.springframework.web.context

    public interface ServletContextAware
extends Aware
    Interface to be implemented by any object that wishes to be notified of the ServletContext (typically determined by the WebApplicationContext) that it runs in.
    Since:
    12.03.2004
    Author:
    Juergen Hoeller, Chris Beams
    See Also:
    ServletConfigAware

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setServletContext(ServletContext servletContext)
      Set the ServletContext that this object runs in.

    • Method Detail

      • setServletContext

        void setServletContext(ServletContext servletContext)
        Set the ServletContext that this object runs in.

        Invoked after population of normal bean properties but before an init callback like InitializingBean's afterPropertiesSet or a custom init-method. Invoked after ApplicationContextAware's setApplicationContext.

        Parameters:
        servletContext - ServletContext object to be used by this object
        See Also:
        InitializingBean.afterPropertiesSet(), ApplicationContextAware.setApplicationContext(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext)
